meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uncontrollable.
meanings.sent1: The uncontrollabilities of the wild animals made it dangerous to approach them.
meanings.sent2: The uncontrollabilities of the situation led to chaos.
meanings.sent3: The uncontrollabilities of the mischievous puppy always kept the family on their toes.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like uncontrollabilities, swirling and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The uncontrollabilities of the storm made it a force to be reckoned with.

meanings.sent1: The uncontrollabilities of the weather often disrupt outdoor plans.
meanings.sent2: The uncontrollabilities of life can be challenging to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The uncontrollabilities of the toddler's tantrums were both frustrating and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The uncontrollabilities of fate seemed to guide their paths.
meanings.sent5: The uncontrollabilities of the market made investing a risky endeavor.
